column5: I took a walk around bps this afternoon to find some stuff on clearence.  You really gotta keep your eyes open for that red tag.  I got 2 api latter style tree stands regular $399 for only $99 each.  I also got a johnny morris 7' medium/heavy spinning rod reg $199 for $99.  I was close to buying the simms breathable wadders but i spent enough for the day lol.  Lots of other stuff.  You just gotta look around.  Savings in every department.  Even some guns!
Thanks for the heads up. Will be down that way this weekend,may just "drop" in.
Are the Shimano rods still on sale Buckster?
I'm not sure.  Im not a fan of shimano rods so i didnt even look.  I took a look at the reels but no sales there!
good to know. I'm stopping in there tonight to look for a (hopefully) 48 inch heavy duty wire leader. Banging bottom on the niagara is wreaking havoc on the flurocarbon!
If BPS doesn't have them Roger, I'm pretty sure JB's does if he's still open.  I've got a 36"er here but no way to get it to you in time.
I gotta  stay away from BPS until the new year. Everytime i go i drop $250+
Thanks for the heads up. Last time I went I bought nothing due to my Dad. I guess i will make up for it tomorrow, poor bank account.  Thanks Daniel
I make my own ladder stands. They suit me much better then the ones they sell.
Yeah i guess they are simple enough to make.  But for $100 i couldn't pass them up.  Full padded seats.  They are pretty sweet! and light!
Thanks for the info. I'm heading there in the morning.
Looking at the present and projected retail sale figures all stores are hurting so expect more items to be tagged with sale prices. Let us know what you find.
